content: Ruamrudee International School Swiss Section, also known as Swiss School Bangkok (German: Schweizerschule Bangkok) or Deutschsprachige Schule Bangkok, is a private not-for-profit international school operating under Ruamrudee International School in Minburi, Bangkok, Thailand. It offers grades from pre-kindergarten to grade 12 with a combined Swiss and German curriculum. The school currently has about 230 students. It is recognized by Germany and Switzerland as an official School Abroad, and it is subsidized by both countriesâ€™ governments.
